special_abilities.name: Rally the Troops (1/Day).
special_abilities.description: The aartuk magically ends the charmed and frightened conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of itself.

special_abilities.name: Tongue (Recharge 6).
special_abilities.description: The aartuk tries to use its gooey tongue to snare one Medium or smaller creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is grappled by the tongue (escape DC 11) and pulled up to 25 feet toward the aartuk. The tongue can grapple one creature at a time.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.description: The aartuk makes two Branch attacks, two Radiant Pellet attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Branch.
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Pellet.
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +2 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (3d4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics).
actions.description: The aartuk casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
